page.title: 09PRIMARY EDUCATION
page.content: PRIMARY EDUCATION IN HOGHTON THERE WERE ORIGINALLY TWO SCHOOLS SERVING THE VILLAGE OF HOGHTON. THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN VICTORIAN TIMES AND WAS SITUATED ON THE MAIN ROAD, NEAR TO THE ENTRANCE TO HOGHTON TOWER. THE BUILDING OF NEW HOUSING ESTATES AT COUPE GREEN MEANT THE CLOSING DOWN OF THIS SCHOOL AND THE OPENING OF A NEW PRIMARY SCHOOL AT COUPE GREEN IN 1974. THE OLD SCHOOL IS NOW A PRIVATE HOUSE. THE ROMAN CATHOLIC PRIMARY SCHOOL HAS ALSO MOVED FURTHER AWAY FROM THE VILLAGE. IT WAS ORIGINALLY NEAR TO THE CHURCH. THIS BUILDING IS NOW USED AS A COMMUNITY CENTRE.
